TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ListBindingHelper extends System.Object
public ref class ListBindingHelper abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供探索可繫結清單的功能，以及清單中所包含之項目的屬性 (如果這些屬性與它們所繫結之物件的公用屬性不同時)。

span.span: Provides functionality to discover a bindable list and the properties of the items contained in the list when they differ from the public properties of the object to which they bind.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別這類的類別使用。This class is used by classes such as . 請注意，對於智慧型手機應用程式，這個類別會要求 Windows Mobile 5.0 版軟體適用於智慧型手機。Note that for Smartphone applications, this class requires Windows Mobile Version 5.0 software for Smartphones.

summary.span: 傳回與資料來源相關聯的清單。

span.span: Returns a list associated with a data source.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object GetList (object list);
.method public static hidebysig object GetList(object list) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetList (list As Object) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ GetList(System::Object ^ list);

param.name: list
param.span: 要檢查其基礎清單的資料來源。

span.span: The data source to examine for its underlying list.

summary.span: 傳回與指定之資料來源相關聯的清單。

span.span: Returns a list associated with the specified data source.

returns.span: 如果清單存在的話，則為表示基礎清單的 ，否則為 所指定的原始資料來源。

span.span: An representing the underlying list if it exists; otherwise, the original data source specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果資料來源指定`list`參數實作介面，然後在方法會傳回型別的物件表示相關聯的清單。If the data source specified by the `list` parameter implements the interface, then the method will return an object of type that represents the associated list. 否則，這個方法只會傳回指定之資料來源，因為沒有任何基礎清單。Otherwise, this method will just return the specified data source since there is no underlying list.

span.span: The data source from which to find the list.

param.name: dataMember
param.span: 含有清單之資料來源屬性的名稱。

span.span: The name of the data source property that contains the list.

param.span: 這可以是 。

span.span: This can be .

summary.span: 從指定之資料來源和選擇性 (Optional) 資料成員的評估中，傳回物件 (通常是清單)。

span.span: Returns an object, typically a list, from the evaluation of a specified data source and optional data member.

returns.span: 如果找到的話，則為表示基礎清單的 ，否則為 。

span.span: An representing the underlying list if it was found; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果資料成員是`null`或空字串 ("")，則方法會傳回`dataSource`。If the data member is `null` or an empty string (""), the method returns `dataSource`. 如果`dataSource`不是清單中，傳回的值`dataSource`符合屬性`dataMember`值。If `dataSource` is not a list, returns the value of the `dataSource` property that matches the `dataMember` value. 如果`dataSource`是清單，在於其實是或介面，然後從清單中選擇一個項目和查詢所命名的屬性值的項目取得基礎清單`dataMember`。If `dataSource` is a list, in that it implements either the or interfaces, then the underlying list is obtained by choosing an item from the list and querying that item for the value of the property named by `dataMember`.

exception.span: 指定的資料成員名稱與所有針對資料來源找到的屬性不符。

span.span: The specified data member name did not match any of the properties found for the data source.

summary.span: 傳回 ，其中描述清單中所包含之項目或清單本身的屬性。

span.span: Returns a that describes the properties of the items contained in the list or the list itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來檢查資料來源屬性的集合。The method is used to examine the collection of properties for a data source. 這個方法的動作而定的實際型別`list`根據下表的參數：The action of this method depends on the actual type of the `list` parameter according to the following table: |參數型別Parameter type|動作Action| |--------------------|------------| |型別清單或項目的集合。A type that is a list or collection of items.|傳回描述清單中包含的項目類型的屬性。Returns a describing the properties of the item type contained in the list.| |不是清單或集合型別。A type that is not a list or collection.|傳回描述類型的屬性。Returns a describing the properties of the type.| |`null`|傳回空的 。Returns an empty .|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會很有用的資料來源都有屬性項目的集合，您需要知道不是集合型別的屬性集合中的項目類型的屬性。The method is useful when the data source has properties that are a collection of items and you need to know properties of the item type in the collection, not the properties of the collection type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `dataMember`參數可以是`null`的情況下方法會傳回使用資料來源的屬性描述與陣列。The `dataMember` parameter can be `null`, in which case the method will return property descriptions using the data source and the array. 資料成員都有屬性項目的集合，您需要知道不是集合型別的屬性集合中的項目類型的屬性時很有用。 is useful when the data member has properties that are a collection of items and you need to know properties of the item type in the collection, not the properties of the collection type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`list`參數不是清單或陣列中，傳回的型別將會為屬於`list`參數本身。If the `list` parameter is not a list or array, the type returned will be that of the `list` parameter itself.

param.name: dataSource
param.span: 要檢查項目的資料來源。

span.span: The data source to examine for items.

param.name: dataMember
param.span: 資料來源上屬性的選擇性名稱，而這個資料來源將當做資料成員使用。

span.span: The optional name of the property on the data source that is to be used as the data member.

param.span: 這可以是 。

summary.span: 傳回指定之資料來源中項目的資料型別。

span.span: Returns the data type of the items in the specified data source.

returns.span: 若為複雜資料繫結，則為資料來源中由 所表示之項目的 ，否則為清單本身中項目的 。

span.span: For complex data binding, the of the items represented by the in the data source; otherwise, the of the item in the list itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個版本的方法用來判斷用在複雜或簡單資料繫結配置中的項目類型。This version of the method is used to determine the type of items used in complex or simple data-binding schemes. 這個靜態方法可能有助於判斷提議的資料繫結配置之前它是否適當。This static method may be useful in determining whether a proposed data-binding scheme is appropriate before attempting it. 如果`dataSource`是`null`、 清單的項目指定的資料成員中，找不到屬性描述項，或將清單項目的屬性描述元是，則這個方法會傳回的型別類別。If `dataSource` is `null`, the property descriptors cannot be found for the list items of the specified data member, or the property descriptor for the list item is an , then this method returns the type of the class. 如果`dataMember`是`null`或空的則這個方法會傳回資料來源中的項目，如果它是清單中; 否則這個方法會傳回的資料來源本身。If `dataMember` is `null` or empty, then this method returns the of the items in the data source, if it is a list; otherwise, this method returns the of the data source itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`listAccessors`是`null`或空白，方法會傳回資料來源類型的名稱。If `listAccessors` is `null` or empty, the method returns the name of the data source type.
